column3: At least one tag has value >100?
Special-use fonts shouldn't be expressive (e.g. Barcode and Cute?)
Active but no italics or slant?
Italic or Slant but not Active?
Small-caps families are banned from Business
Learn to Write but not Calm?

column1: tag["/Expressive/Calm"] == 0 and tag["/Classification/Neo-grotesque"] > 0 and font["OS/2"]["usWeightClass"] < 600 and not font["isCondensed"]
tag["/Expressive/Calm"] == 0 and tag["/Classification/Humanist Sans"] > 0 and font["OS/2"]["usWeightClass"] < 600 and not font["isCondensed"]
tag["/Expressive/Calm"] == 0 and tag["/Classification/Geometric Sans"] > 0 and font["OS/2"]["usWeightClass"] < 600 and not font["isCondensed"]
column3: Geometric Sans light and not Calm?

column1: tag["/Expressive/Calm"] == 0 and tag["/Sans/Rounded] > 0 and font["OS/2"]["usWeightClass"] < 600 and not font["isCondensed"]
column3: Rounded Sans light and not Calm?
Childlike and Cute — OK but check story form of 'a/g'
Childlike and Happy — OK but check stylistic intent
Childlike and Handwritten — check writing intent

column1: #tag["/Expressive/Competent"] == 0 and font["HasDoubleStoryA"] == True and font["HasDoubleStoryG"] == True
column3: Double-story 'a' and 'g' but not Competent? (combine to another condition (sans serif for example))
Pan-African glyph support but not Competent?
Competent and multiscript — reinforce global applicability
Blobby cheerful forms but not Happy?
Unconventional historical reinterpretation but not Innovative?
Modern reinterpretation of Art Deco but not Innovative?
Innovative but Fancy ornamentation without purpose?
Fat Face (high contrast display) but not Loud?
Loud and Happy (ok but check intent)?
Brush style irregularities but not Playful?
Playful and Excited (ok, but check strength)?
Slab Clarendon robust but not Rugged?
Geometric Slab sturdy but not Rugged?
Stencil military toughness but not Rugged?
Humanist Sans legibility but not Sincere?
Accessibility-driven design (Lexend, Hyperlegible) but not Sincere?
Readable formal calligraphy but not Sincere?
Regular cursive handwriting but not Sincere?
Old Style serif but not Sophisticated?
High stroke contrast but not Sophisticated?
Modern serif precision but not Sophisticated?
High stroke contrast but not Stiff?
Neo Grotesque sans but not Stiff?
High weight ratio but not Stiff?
